sentences.english: Officers with dogs then began to patrol the area.
sentences.chinese: 牵警犬的警察随后开始在这一地区巡逻。

sentences.english: Think of yourself as a puppet with a string coming out of the top of your head.
sentences.chinese: 把自己想象成是一个牵线木偶，头上有一根线牵着。

sentences.english: Two pairs of attractive men and women were led by first-line emotional destiny.
sentences.chinese: 两对俊男美女的情感命运被牵一线。

sentences.english: Mothers hold their childrens hands for a while, but hold their hearts forever.
sentences.chinese: 母亲只短暂地牵孩子的手，却永远掌握住孩子的心。

sentences.english: I can conquer the world with one hand, if you're holding the other.
sentences.chinese: 你牵着我的手，我就有力量用另一只手去战胜世界。

sentences.english: We're united tightly with sincere blessing and yearning!
sentences.chinese: 纵使遥隔两地，真诚的祝福与怀念会将彼此紧紧相牵。

sentences.english: Later, you will be holding your hand, humming a song.
sentences.chinese: 以后，你会牵着谁的手，哼着怎样的歌。

sentences.english: Today I was with my dog ​​when jogging in the forest.
sentences.chinese: 今天我牵着我的狗狗到森林中慢跑。

sentences.english: Buyers cleared the day's cattle run at steady rates.
sentences.chinese: 买主以稳定的价格买光了这一天牵到集市来的牲口。

sentences.english: Daytime led you to eat grass, black and you into cow circle dalai.
sentences.chinese: 白天牵你去吃草，黑哒牵你进牛圈。

sentences.english: Daytime led you to eat grass, black and you into cow circle dalai.
sentences.chinese: 白天牵你去吃草，黑哒牵你进牛圈。

sentences.english: We need not take the bear by the tooth.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有必要去牵着熊的牙齿。

sentences.english: He took me by the hand, and led me out into the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他牵着我的手，将我领出宫殿来到花园。

sentences.english: Look forward to the day to hold my marriage is that I love the boy.
sentences.chinese: 期待有一天牵我步入婚姻殿堂的是那个我深爱的少年。

sentences.english: Come and give me your hand, I'll take you far away.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，让我牵着你的手，我会带你去远方。

sentences.english: Hold a hydrogen balloon instead of a swim ring in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 牵一个氢气球代替游泳圈在海里游泳。
